mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Montgomery, A. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Montgomery, A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Gov FH Peirpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Sept 6 1862. By Telegraph from Pittsburgh, 6 1862. Your telegram rec'd this morning ca furnish the Infantry clothing but have no cavalry clothing will telegraph QM Genl about the latter. A Montgomery QM USA 23G61pd
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Montgomery, A.
Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
